page.title: 07SOUTH MOOR FAIR
page.content: On June 15th 1985 the 3rd Annual South Moor Fair took place on the Park playing fields,organized by 15 local youth,community and charitable groups. Each group used the day to promote its activities,to raise funds for charity, to recruit members and to provide a day of fun and entertainment for the local populace. The show began with a parade through the streets of South Moor led by the South Moor Modernaires Jazz Band.The main feature was the Fancy Dress Parade for children.Other features were Pushing the Bed,Welly Hoying, Tug-o-War,a Pet Dog show,the Rams Morris Dancers and Lanchester Youth Brass Band as well as many side-shows. It was a fine day,the crowds were large and everyone had a good time.
